definition: to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid

sentences.english: The State shall advocate that labourers practice individual insurance in form of saving account.
sentences.chinese: 国家提倡劳动者个人进行储蓄性保险。

sentences.english: The State encourages paying the central tax on time.
sentences.chinese: 国家提倡按时缴纳中央税。

sentences.english: Preoperative massive transfusion and pericardiocentesis are not advocated.
sentences.chinese: 不提倡术前大量扩容及心包穿刺。

sentences.english: Afforestation has been promoted heaily in mid-latitudes as a means of mitigating climate change.
sentences.chinese: 在中纬度地区大力提倡植树造林以减缓气候变化。

sentences.english: The State advocates for individual workers to engage in savings insurance.
sentences.chinese: 国家提倡劳动者个人进行储蓄性保险。

sentences.english: Clinton, herself, has advocated a "positive and cooperative" relationship with Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 克林顿提倡与北京保持“积极合作”的关系。

sentences.english: We think every young couple should set up a home of their own.
sentences.chinese: 我们提倡所有的小两口都能靠自己的双手构建家园。

sentences.english: Yemen is a testing ground for the “scalpel” approach Mr. Brennan endorses.
sentences.chinese: 也门是布瑞南先生提倡的“手术刀式打击”的检验场。

sentences.english: Tosun tzu, war is a matter of life and death. This is the key principle of histeachings.
sentences.chinese: 孙子认为战争关乎生死，这是他所提倡的关键原则。

sentences.english: Many educationists think highly of the aesthetic education and try their best to advocate it.
sentences.chinese: 许多教育家都重视美育，不遗余力地提倡美育。

sentences.english: It says "let's also study the best".
sentences.chinese: 它提倡也去研究最优秀的个体。

sentences.english: The Renaissance and Humanism: Humanism is the key-note of the Renaissance.
sentences.chinese: 文艺复兴，提倡理性，人文主义。

sentences.english: Schools should promote hand hygiene and respiratory etiquette and be stocked with appropriate supplies.
sentences.chinese: 学校应提倡手部卫生和咳嗽礼仪并适当储备相关物资。

sentences.english: In addition, Chen et al gun advocates say that the press should be simple to use.
sentences.chinese: 另外，还有陈荣衮等人提倡报章宜改用浅说。

sentences.english: The idea of uprightness and sincerity implicated in it is of great significance to today's society.
sentences.chinese: 其提倡的正心诚信思想对当今社会有重要意义。

sentences.english: Though perhaps that's what many privacy advocates fear most.
sentences.chinese: 然而这也许正是很多隐私保护提倡者最担心的事。

definition: to advocate/to initiate/to propose/to be a proponent of (an idea or school of thought)
to hold up (as an model)/to hold in esteem/to revere/to advocate
to esteem/to think highly of/to accord importance to/to revere
to follow/to abide by/to comply with/compliance
to put into effect/to carry out
